pine.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter
pine.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the pale wood of pine trees, used to make furniture, floors etc
pine.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to become sad and not continue your life as normal because someone has died or gone away
pine.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Six months after he left, she was still pining.
